title: Flare: a ski trip
creator_credit: Sam Neill, Tom Williamson and New Zealand National Film Unit
brief_description: A team of six skiers returning to New Zealand demonstrate freestyle skiing. The three basic Freestyle skills; Ballet, Jumping and Moguls or Bumps are shown in North and South Island Skifields. The film culminates in a skier’s dream - to ski the untracked slopes of a live volcano.
